mng: to feel, to move, to touch, to affect, feeling, emotion, (suffix) sense of ~

exm.mng: to feel, to become aware of, feeling, sense, perception
to sense, perception, to feel (through the senses), to experience, a feeling, an impression, an experience
to feel, to sense, to have the feeling that, to think that, to move, to affect
feeling, emotion, sensation, likes and dislikes, deep affection for sb or sth, relationship (i.e. love affair)
to feel, to sense, to detect, to perceive, to become aware
